Title: Outcomes of fertility investigations in a cohort of adults with perinatally acquired HIV-1 infection: a UK cross-sectional observational study
Abstract: Copyright © 2020 The Author(s). Published by Wolters Kluwer Health, Inc.There are no published studies of fertility measurements in people living with perinatally acquired HIV (PaHIV). We performed fertility investigations in 25 adults with PaHIV. Seven (78%) men had sperm morphology normal forms (%) below the fifth centile for the general population with four (44%) having no normal forms. Mean (SD) serum anti-Müllerian hormone level was 19.4 (9.5) pmol/l; lower than expected for this age group. A larger study is needed to verify our findings.
